show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Health Impacts of Fracking
content:
Today on Connect the Dots at 10 AM ET on the Progressive Radio Network, Huffington and Alternet reporter and program... <!--more--> host, Alison Rose Levy speaks with Dr Larysa Dyrszka, who is working with physicians and environmental groups to gather and undertake solid scientific investigation into the likely health impacts of fracking.
Dr Dyrszka will reveal the crucial need for complete and well-conducted health impact assessments.
